Posts.Content:
Anyone have issues from the breast marker clip left behind after a biopsy? I am getting a biopsy in a few days and I am not very excited about
 the clip. I have heard they can cause residual pain in the breast.
Posts.Title: Breast marker clip

Posts.Content:
Thanks Sher! Very helpful to hear this. Feeling better about
 the whole thing hearing from a few people that it isn't causing pain or other problems. It seems like the smarter way to go for the most part but counterintuitive at the same time. A piece of metal in delicate breast tissue… I'm sure an immune response and inflammation occur but I suppose it all settles down and heals up.
Posts.Title: Breast marker clip

Posts.Content:
I am so sorry to hear about
 all of this anxiety producing waiting you have had to deal with and I hope its all positive in the end. If you don't mind my asking, when you had the biopsy, did you end up with a breast marker clip? If so, is it painful or can you feel it?
Getting a biopsy soon, also for a 7mm mass and I am not excited about
 the marker clip…
Posts.Title: Call back for biopsy 3 weeks away.. kinda freaking out!

Posts.Content: Anyone? I quite petite, 100 pounds and an A cup. I was given the option to get it or not.
Posts.Title: Breast marker clip
